casebody.data:
Deniece SHELTON, individually and on behalf of a class of all persons similarly situated
v.
DUKE UNIVERSITY HEALTH SYSTEM, INC. d/b/a Raleigh Community Hospital, d/b/a Duke Health Raleigh Hospital, d/b/a Duke University Hospital, d/b/a Duke University Medical Center and d/b/a Durham Regional Hospital. No. 470P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 15, 2007. Gary K. Shipman, William Wright, Wilmington, for Shelton. John M. Simpson, Frederick Robinson, Stephen M. McNabb, Washington, DC, for Duke Univ. Health Sys., et al. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 633 S.E.2d 113 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 15th day of September 2006 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th day of February 2007."
